description: A belt crafted in the shape of a coiled serpent, its body formed from interlocking emerald segments. The eyes are tiny rubies that seem to watch with serpentine intelligence. Created by yuan-ti sorcerers or druids who revere the serpent as sacred, the belt grants complete immunity to venom and the ability to communicate with snakes.
magicEffect: Immunity to poison, Speak with serpents
name: Emerald Serpent Belt
